eu_initiatives: Common Agricultural Policy; Environment, Climate Change; Biodiversity, Butterfly Conservation; Nature Conservation
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: Butterfly Conservation Europe aims to prevent the extinction of any species of butterfly and moth, especially in Europe, and promote all activities and initiatives to conserve butterflies, moths and their habitats in Europe.
